The main difference between #PoS and #PoW is the fact that PoW uses electricity as an unlimited resource. #Cardano uses native $ADA coins as a limited resource in the PoS consensus. ADA will be a really precious resource that is bonded to the success of the network.  #crypto  https://t.co/vlXF1mczEF

If you are a #Bitcoin miner then you have to buy an expensive #ASIC hardware and give off the part of $BTC to pay for the electricity.  In the case of the #Cardano network, you just need to delegate $ADA coins to a pool and coins multiply over time.  #blockchain #crypto #PoS #PoW  https://t.co/4y7qTGgske
